data.text: @mtoni93 @HammeredInAVan @JohnDoe78359022 Sounds like she doesn’t mind. Villain suits her
@JohnDoe78359022 As much as I loved my mother...Mary got off easy.
@JohnDoe78359022 They’ve gotta be the most mismatched couple of all time. Obi-Wan Kenobi & Ramona Flowers?

@JohnDoe78359022 Whoo boy, my heart breaks for this girl. I went through a very similar situation at her same age, father took up with one of his students & booked during my graduation. It burned me for years, until my 30s I was still furious. So I do feel her pain. It took a long time to let go.
